textBeforeTable: 2015 Tour Dates Low price $2 High price $431 Average Price $98 Past 12 Months Find Tickets Glen Hansard Ticket Prices Read more Irish actor and troubadour Glen Hansard is returning stateside for a series of intimate tour dates this winter. He’ll start his road trip off on February 2 at Iron City in Birmingham, AL, before heading to New Orleans, LA; Ponte Vedra Beach, FL; Orlando, FL; Charleston, SC; Charlotte, NC; Washington, DC (at the Lincoln Theatre);… Glen Hansard Embarks on Intimate U.S. Tour November 06, 2014 News It's true that Hansard is still considered the principal songwriter and vocalist for The Frames, but he's certainly come a long way all on his own. And only time will tell if he can achieve the same level of success. If you ask us, he's well on his way. Did you know that the highly acclaimed play "Once, The Musical" won eight Tony Awards including best direction of a musical, best lead actor in a musical and the top musical prize itself? "Once,
